thread.title: Selena Gomez And The Weeknd Pack On PDA In Pics From Their Italian Vacation
thread.title_full: Selena Gomez And The Weeknd Pack On PDA In Pics From Their Italian Vacation

author: Anna Menta
title: Selena Gomez And The Weeknd Pack On PDA In Pics From Their Italian Vacation
text:
Like Us On Facebook Like Us On Facebook 
Selena Gomez and The Weeknd absconded to Italy together, which must mean they are really not messing around. 
I mean, I’ve been with my boyfriend for three years and we’ve never absconded anywhere together. That might be because we’re poor, though. Anyway. 
Selena and The Weeknd were spotted out and about by fans in Florence on Friday. It’s a little blurry, but if you squint you can see Selena in a pink dress getting into the car, and The Weeknd walking around to the other side of the car. [Video]: Selena and The Weeknd spotted out in Florence, Italy today! pic.twitter.com/jTQSUpcwha 
— Selena Gomez News (@LifeWithSelG) January 27, 2017 See? Those little blobs there? That’s them. Twitter And this is definitely a romantic getaway — look at them cuddle! January 27: Selena and The Weeknd in Florence, Italy. pic.twitter.com/o7V1MSmgoO 
— Team Selena Gomez (@TeamSelenaGomez) January 27, 2017 
Or maybe Selena Gomez is just bored and tired from all the art museums the couple is hitting up. According to The Weeknd’s Instagram story, it looks like they’re taking full advantage of the Art Capital of the Renaissance. Instagram 
I’m no art historian, but that looks a lot like some fancy old Italian art you’d find in Florence. It looks like some lucky fans in Florence have seen the couple out and about, too. Twitter Twitter 
Earlier this week, the couple was seen holding hands together in LA . Before that, The Weeknd followed Selena on Instagram . 
Now, they are off on a romantic getaway to Italy? Like damn, just get married already, am I right? 
Of course, it’s only been two weeks since they were first seen kissing each other outside Giorgio Baldi in Santa Monica. Selena Gomez and The Weeknd Making Out (PHOTO GALLERY) https://t.co/v848LeJwKt pic.twitter.com/AMtIZE47EC 
— NEWS CLEVER MEDIA (@HOTCELEBINSIDER) January 11, 2017 
So it actually seems like they are taking things pretty fast. Maybe they got inspired by Selena’s BFF Taylor Swift and Tom Hiddleston, though let’s hope they don’t end up like them. 
Well, good for Selena for finding a man who treats her to a trip to Italy. 
(Meanwhile, my boyfriend made me pay for the Taco Bell last weekend for the third time in a row, but I’m not bitter!) 
Oh, and can someone check on Justin Bieber and Bella Hadid , please? Why Selena Gomez Getting With The Weeknd Is So Awkward To view this video please enable JavaScript, and considerupgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video
